newsitem.title: UK: NWE naphtha firm, demand especially good for N+A.
newsitem.headline: NWE naphtha firm, demand especially good for N+A.

text.p: NWE naphtha was firmer on Wednesday and supply was tight, traders said.
An ARA refiner bought 8,000 tonnes of high paraffinic naphtha from northern Germany at $210 cif ARA.
A trader was heard still in the market for pipeline quality barrels, and was heard prepared to pay the same number.

Demand was still heard from Canada for 45 N+A material, and little heavy product was seen available except for a 5,000 tonne Russian piece. A trader was offering a Ras Lanuf cargo at high cif +$4, and an Alexandria cargo was being shown at the same level. -- Nicholas Shaxson, London newsroom +44 171 542 8167
